sentences.en: Contact lenses were once thought to be eyeglass killers.
sentences.cn: 隐形眼镜一度被认为是普通眼镜的杀手。

sentences.en: His solution : DAC Vision would develop its own state - of - the - art machinery for making eyeglass lenses.
sentences.cn: 国际先进技术水平的;艺术级---这两种会比较贴切吧. 你所想的“巧夺天工”似乎太“拽”了,感觉也你真能展开想像的翅膀!

sentences.en: Since our company established in 1997, bending ourself to manufacture the photics lens and eyeglass.
sentences.cn: 本公司自一九九七年成立以来, 一直致力于光学镜头、镜片的制造.

sentences.en: Some of the tycoons that skipped town including Hu Fulin owner of Zhejiang Center Group a major eyeglass maker were convinced or coerced into coming back.
sentences.cn: 一些失踪的企业主，包括胡福林（音），浙江中心集团（一家主要的镜片制造商）的老板，在劝说或强迫之下返回了企业。

trans.tran_en: a lens for one eye, worn to help you see better with that eye
